body.name: SYLVOX 75 inch Outdoor TV, 2000 nits Full Sun LED Outdoor TV, 4K UHD Smart Television IP55 Waterproof, High Brightness, ATSC & NTSC Tuner, Support Bluetooth & 2.4G WiFi, for Outside & Backyard
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【Outdoor TV for Full Sun Areas】 Sylvox pool series outdoor TV brightness up to 2000 nits, which is 6 times that of ordinary home TV. You can adjust the brightness according to the external light environment, clear videos can be viewed even under the hot sun.

【Built in Multiple Applications】 This outdoor smart TV built-in multiple apps such as Netflix, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, prime video and more, support wireless Bluetooth and WiFi connection. Note: Doesn’t support download apps and 5G WiFi connection.

【Brilliant 4K Picture Quality】 This 4K UHD TV has 3840*2160 high resolution, ultra-wide color gamut of picture levels and details create stunning picture quality, more obvious details, and stronger sense of hierarchy, let you immerse yourself in wonderful visual enjoyment.

【Sturdy and Durable】 IP55 waterproof, Weather resistant from -22F to 122F outside temperatures, All metal shell and special paint treatment, anti-scratch and corrosion-resistant, suitable for any outdoor place, such as garden, terrace, patio, outdoor restaurant, etc.

【Multiple connections】 75 inch 4K outdoor TV with ATSC+NTSC tuner, Optical Out, HDMI×3, USB×2, RJ45 and YPbPr, supports connections for multiple media sources. This 55” TV is designed for wall mounting, tabletop use is not recommended. VESA standard 600×400mm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compared with indoor TVs, Sylvox Pool series outdoor TVs feature up to 2000nits of brightness, IP55 waterproof performance, metal body, and unique cooling technology. No matter what the season is, no matter what the weather is, you can watch whatever you like on TV whenever you want to be outdoors.

4K Ultra HD Upgrade your entertainment experience with brilliant 4K Ultra HD at up to 60fps. Sylvox Outdoor TV delivers stunning picture quality with 4 times the resolution of 1080P Full HD. HDR Experience rich, accurate colors, deeper structure, and improved brightness for more stunning detail. See shades of color you can't find on HDTV.

Built-in APPs Our outdoor smart TV has built-in up to 38 apps, including netflix, YouTube, prime video, tikilive, pandora, Facebook, Twitter, toon goggles, YouTube kids, etc. It should be noted that this outdoor TV does not support download APP. Enjoy in more ways HDMI×3, USB×2, 2.4G WiFi and Bluetooth, connect fire stick, roku, or other your favorite content providers, or pair your external speakers for a better sound experience.

2000 Nit High Brightness The screen brightness of the outdoor TV can be adjusted according to different lighting conditions. Maximum brightness 2000 nits enjoy ultra-high-definition pictures even in the summer sun.

Weather-Resistant IP55 outdoor TV protection from water, dust, rain and snow, can be used outside at -22° to 122° F, enrich your outdoor recreational activities and bring a new experience to your outdoor party.

Screen Size 43“ 55” 65“ 75” Brightness adjustment range 300 nits to 2000 nits Waterproof Level IP55 Display Type TFT LED Resolution 4K UHD 3840x2160 TV Tuner ATSC & NTSC Refresh Rate 60 Hz Response Time 8ms Speaker Built-in 2 × 10W Wall Mount 443" 400×200mm, 55" 400×200mm, 65" 400×400mm, 75" 600×400mm View Angles 178°/178° Operating Temp -22℉ to 122℉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Outdoor TV for cost!
reviews.reviewText: Giving this a 5 star solely on the merits of the TV itself.I have it on my rooftop on my town home in Texas and it faces all kinds of weather/sun/heat&freeze and has stood the test of time. (I still recommend a cover when not using)The picture is great in sun or shade. This TV has all the apps you want with a good remote and easy interface.Audio with out soundbar was decent consider outdoor TV and environment (audio will always be better inside due to physics).I am now the envy of my HOA and friends all want to come over for the games! Love this TV!Okay, now, non-TV related things to add (non factor to 5 star):- I originally bought the https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0B63F7Y95/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1- It arrived broke and had to work through Sylvox through the issues. They were responsive, just very annoying to receive a broken TV.- From what I could make of the first one, I am almost happy it arrived broke now, because spending the money for the Pool Pro was WAY WORTH it (better quality/apps/specs). Spend the extra money and get Pool Pro.- I also have their sound bar for the TV and have mixed reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not so Smart
reviews.reviewText: The good is it has a bright 4K picture that does well in the sun and the TV appears to be well built against the weather.The not so good part is there are only a few Apps built like Netflix and YouTube, but nothing else popular! There are several that are missing so we had to add a Roku to get Amazon, YouTubeTV, Pluto, etc... and the worst part is the Roku cannot control the volume or power since the TV has a unknown IR code.There are no updates to correct this as of yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Time will tell but it appears to be up for the task
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 43" full sun version. It will be installed outside soon. I tested it inside and the display seems plenty bright enough, and the picture quality is on par with typical 4K TVs. This will be used as a digital display, located on the exterior of a marina office. It will bear the brunt of full sun, rain, and salt mist coming off the water. So, be on the lookout for my follow-up review in a few months! If this thing can hold up to this environment, I think we have a winner! LOL. Stay tuned...My only gripe for now is, removing the back panel is a pain. It's 13 tiny screws. If you drop them, they are gone forever. Why didn't they use thumb-screws instead? Cost, I'm sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV & Excellent Customer Service.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this TV back on July 12th 2022. I was quite pleased with the very good picture quality during the day in the sun. At night the picture quality is outstanding.I had an issue with the TV malfunctioning. It was still under warrantee and Sylvox immediately addressed the issue and sent me a replacement 2023 model.They also arranged for the return of the TV to their factory in Canada.I want to specifically thank Maggie at Sylvox for making the entire process stress free and for her excellent customer service.I would recommend Sylvox products for anyone that is looking for a quality outdoor TV reasonably priced and backed by really great customer service and support of their product.Cheers Maggie and thank you Sylvox for standing by the quality of your TV.Nick Mascia/ New York City

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I researched up and down. This tv fit the bill and arrived in excellent condition. I chose the pool series as opposed to the pool pro knowing I was going to use my fire stick that spent time in jail and then broke out. It is heavy - 73 lbs, so get an appropriate heavy duty wall mount. I will also say that I anticipated controlling the tv with my firestick remote and initially found that Sylvox and the parent manufacturer aren’t on the supported firestick list. I searched and searched, and found that a Roku remote will support it if Polaroid or RCA is chosen, so I gave it a shot. Lo and behold, Polaroid worked! My firestick remote now controls my Sylvox TV! Also, if your concerned about visibility in full sun, I was very very pleased with the picture with the sun shining directly on it, and the only consequence of the sun was the viewing angle was minimally affected. Nice TV!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great TV…. But ARC HDMI doesn’t work.
reviews.reviewText: Tv is great, great picture. Was easy to install. It’s built well… only issue I have is the ARC isn’t working properly with my Apple TV. Every other tv I have if you have the Apple TV hooked to ARC you can turn TV on and off through the Apple TV, on this TV it does seem to work that way. You still have to power each thing individually even though it’s hooked to the ARC HDMI port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: Edited: excellent customer service! We have now been granted an expedited refund and a coupon code to cover the shipping cost out of pocket. New tv has been ordered and will be shipped freight to avoid damage. Maggie has been in touch multiple times a day.Of note: this is the second tv purchased, though I failed to review the first. The fact that we continue to order them says it all - it’s a great product And very good sound. It is very heavy but as long as you hang properly, not an issue.We received this TV today. Box was damaged and upon unboxing, noted TV is broken. Our return was supposed to come with what they say is a prepaid label but it was only an address and said that we had to pay shipping. This tv is HEAVY and it cost us over $323 to ship back! That's crazy. I was going to re-order the same item but how can I when it is a common issue to have them break in shipment? I would love to get this resolved if someone can reach out to me.
